items.sentence: I\'m not sure whether Tom will be there or not.
I think that something bad is likely to happen.
Tom sat in the car, watching people walking by.
I wanted to show Tom how good I was at skating.
I was able to make myself understood in French.
Tom decided that he shouldn\'t stay any longer.
Do you think Tom will let Mary do that for him?
I thought it might be important to talk to Tom.
I thought what Tom said was very inappropriate.
I thought you had promised to give that to Tom.
